body:
Fresh start. New duel. Prebuilt Tapmaster deck.
Crashed after choosing not to mulligan.

Log:

CRASH REPORT FOR MAGARENA THREAD Thread[Thread-10,1,main]
CREATED ON 2014/01/10 18:45:36
MAGARENA VERSION 1.45, JRE 1.7.0_45, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86

Turn : 1  Phase : FirstMain  Step : ActivePlayer  Player : Computer  Score : 3
0] Player : Ember  Life : 20  Delayed : Total=0
   - Hand : Forest
   - Hand : Rancor
   - Hand : Savannah
   - Hand : Primal Rage
   - Hand : Plains
   - Hand : Plains
   - Hand : Ethereal Armor
1] Player : Computer  Life : 20  Delayed : Total=0
   - Hand : Tundra
   - Hand : Assassinate
   - Hand : Drowned Catacomb
   - Hand : Glacial Fortress
   - Hand : Death Stroke
   - Hand : Plains
Stack : 0
1. MagicAddEventAction (EVENT: 0 Ember may$ take a mulligan. ) = 0
2. MagicAddEventAction (EVENT: 1 Computer may$ take a mulligan. ) = 0
3. MagicExecuteFirstEventAction = 0
4. MagicExecuteFirstEventAction = 0

16. MagicRemoveCardAction (Sleep) = 413
17. MagicMoveCardAction (Blind Obedience,OwnersHand,OwnersLibrary) = 0
18. MagicShuffleIntoLibraryAction = 0
19. MagicRemoveCardAction (Blind Obedience) = 466
20. MagicMoveCardAction (Hallowed Fountain,OwnersHand,OwnersLibrary) = 0
21. MagicShuffleIntoLibraryAction = 0
22. MagicRemoveCardAction (Hallowed Fountain) = 517
23. MagicMoveCardAction (Sunblast Angel,OwnersHand,OwnersLibrary) = 0
24. MagicShuffleIntoLibraryAction = 0

Exception from controller.runGame: null
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at magic.model.choice.MagicTargetChoice.getArtificialOptions(MagicTargetChoice.java:751)
	at magic.model.choice.MagicChoice.getArtificialChoiceResults(MagicChoice.java:90)
	at magic.model.choice.MagicChoice.getSimulationChoiceResult(MagicChoice.java:112)
	at magic.model.event.MagicEvent.getSimulationChoiceResult(MagicEvent.java:380)
	at magic.ai.MCTSAI.getNextChoices(MCTSAI.java:394)
	at magic.ai.MCTSAI.randomPlay(MCTSAI.java:349)
	at magic.ai.MCTSAI.findNextEventChoiceResults(MCTSAI.java:161)
	at magic.ui.GameController.getArtificialNextEventChoiceResults(GameController.java:422)
	at magic.ui.GameController.executeNextEventWithChoices(GameController.java:441)
	at magic.ui.GameController.runGame(GameController.java:536)
	at magic.ui.GamePanel$2.run(GamePanel.java:148)
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: v1.45 crash

comments.body: Managed to repeat this crash - Looks like it's related to Computer having no legal targets for any of the spells in hand.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
